          <title>
            <string language="en">Radiation from the sun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlung von der Sonne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rayonnement du soleil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Radiação do sol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Radiazione dal sole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακτινοβολία από τον ήλιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Radiación del sol</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the Sun sending out energy by emitting light rays and infrared radiation.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">infrared radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vacuum</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Sonne, die Energie 
aussendet, indem sie helle Strahlen und Infrarotstrahlung ausstrahlt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le soleil envoyant 
l'énergie en émettant les rayons légers et le rayonnement 
infrarouge.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o sol que emite para 
fora da energia emitindo-se raios claros e a radiação infravermelha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il sole che spedisce 
l'energia emettendo i raggi luminosi e la radiazione infrarossa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τον ήλιο στέλνοντας την 
ενέργεια με την εκπομπή των ελαφριών ακτίνων και της υπέρυθρης 
ακτινοβολίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el sol que envía 
energía emitiendo rayos ligeros y la radiación infrarroja.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energieübertragung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Infrarotstrahlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">helle Strahlen</string>
